string.value: Allegro, the Master of the Rings
Romeo had decided to propose to Juliet. To help fascilitate that, I better get him a nice ring. The ring can be acquired through Allegro, the master of rings at Wedding Village.

Allegro said the perfect ring for Romeo and Juliet might be the Silver Wing Ring that represents purity, and asked me to gather up the materials for him.

I received the ring from Allegro. I better give this to #bRomeo#k now.
모험가님. 로미오는 #r전갈꼬리볶음#k하고 #r벨라모아양념구이#k 중에 어떤 걸 더 좋아할까요? 아아, 좀 멀리서 구해야 하지만 포이즌푸퍼찜 같은 걸 만드는 게 더 좋을까나~? 어떻게 생각하세요? \r\n#b#L0# 무, 무슨 말씀을 하시는 거죠?#l \r\n#b#L0# 다른 사람의 부탁들 받고 왔는데, 반지를 만들어 주실 수 있나요?#l
다른 사람의...? 사랑의 증표가 없이는 반지를 만들어 드리지 않고 있소만... 대륙 곳곳을 다니며 사랑의 증표를 모아 올 정도의 열정을 보인 분께만 영원한 사랑을 맹세할 자격이 있는 법이니 말이오. \r\n#b#L0# 무, 무슨 말씀을 하시는 거죠?#l \r\n#b#L0# 이번만은 어떻게 안 될까요? 꼭 반지가 필요하다고 하는데...#l
흠... 전혀 상관 없는 사람의 일을 위해 이렇게나 나서다니... 뭔가 특별한 사연이라도 있소? 당신이 어째서 그들을 돕는 것인지... 그들에 대해 알려주시오. \r\n#b#L0# (제뉴미스트와 알카드노의 반대 속에서도 사랑을 이루기 위해 노력했던 로미오와 줄리엣의 이야기를 해준다.)#l
세상의 반대에도 자신의 연인을 지키기 위해 노력한 사랑... 아름다운 이야기로군요. 좋소. 이번만은 로미오와 줄리엣이라는 특별하고 애절한 연인을 위해 반지를 만들어 드리리다.

There's nothing that's as effective as the ring when professing your love to someone. Without a beautiful ring, it'll be that much harder to move her heart. I'll make the most beautiful ring in the world of Maple. The rest is up to you.\r\n#b#L0#I came here on behalf of someone. Can you make a ring for him?#l

Someone else's...? I usually don't make rings without the Proof of Love...since only those that show the desire to scour the world collecting these evidences of love have the right to declare their love to the world.\r\n#b#L0#Can you make an exception for this? He seems to really want a ring...#l

Hmm... it's hard to see someone like you who is very proactive in taking care of someone else's duty. Is there a story behind this? Please tell me the story of the two. \r\n#b#L0#(I tell him the story of Romeo and Juliet, and how they struggle to keep their love in tact despite the conflict between Zenumist and Alcadno.)#l

For them to keep the love afloat despite the whole world telling them no... that's a beautiful story. Alright, I'll make the ring for the two. Their story has touched my heart, and I feel compelled to help them maintain their love for one another.

I am sure you know making rings require materials to work with. Romeo and Juliet... I think for them, a ring like #bSilver Wing Ring#k, which represents purity and innocence, would suffice. Please get me #b2 silvers#k and #b2 diamonds#k so I can make the ring for both of them.
Hmm... did you have a change of heart at the last minute?
What do you think? Did you gather up all the materials? Oh, you did! Now please give me some time, as I will make the ring right this minute...
Here you go, the rings. This beautiful light that emits from the ring shines brighter the tighter the bond gets between the two. May the blessings of the stars be with the two lovers.
I don't think you brought the materials for the Silver Wing Ring. I need #b2 silvers#k and #b2 diamonds#k for this.
